fieldUpdates.name: Auto update Delivery Agent Info on BL fi

fieldUpdates.formula: Cnee__r.EnglishCompanyName__c & BR() & Cnee__r.EnglishAddress__c & BR() & IF( ISBLANK(Cnee__r.Phone), NULL,'TEL: '& Cnee__r.Phone) & IF( ISBLANK(Cnee__r.Fax), NULL, ' - FAX: ' & Cnee__r.Fax)
fieldUpdates.name: COMPMAY INFORMATION AUTO UPDATE-CNEE

fieldUpdates.formula:
Notifyparty__r.EnglishCompanyName__c & BR() &
Notifyparty__r.EnglishAddress__c & BR() & IF( ISBLANK(Notifyparty__r.Phone),NULL, 'TEL: ' & Notifyparty__r.Phone) & IF( ISBLANK(Notifyparty__r.Fax), NULL, ' - FAX: ' & Notifyparty__r.Fax)
fieldUpdates.name: COMPMAY INFORMATION AUTO UPDATE-NOTIFY

fieldUpdates.formula:
shipper__r.EnglishCompanyName__c & BR() &
shipper__r.EnglishAddress__c & BR() & IF( ISBLANK(shipper__r.Phone),NULL, 'TEL: ' & shipper__r.Phone) & IF( ISBLANK(shipper__r.Fax), NULL, ' - FAX: ' & shipper__r.Fax)
fieldUpdates.name: COMPMAY INFORMATION AUTO UPDATE-SHIPPER
Update Date of House B/L Issued
Update Place of House B/L Issued

rules.fullName: %5BF%2FTMS S%2FO%5D Auto Update Airliner Code
%5BF%2FTMS S%2FO%5D Reference Shipper%2C Consignee%2C Notify Party%27s Address
%5BF%2FTMS S%2FO%5D Update Delivery Agent Info on BL
rules.description: Auto update Delivery Agent Info on BL field by referencing relates Delivery Agent Account details
rules.formula: OR( AND( NOT( ISBLANK(DeliveryAgent__c)), ISBLANK(QuotationPaymentCondition__c)), ISCHANGED(DeliveryAgent__c))
